age_politics_confirmation: Accept to confirm that you are of legal age and you accept that we treat your data according to the data protection policy
also_create_hint: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
at_first_place: First of all, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings.
could_not_restore_password: You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
create_your_clue: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)
err_not_modified: We were unable to modify your Master Password. Try again later.
how_it_works_text: First of all, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
password_manager_created: Your Password Manager is already created!
password_master_secrets: Create your master key: only you can access your secrets with it.
save_here_all_password: Store all your passwords, data or any information here, forget paper notes and unprotected applications.
should_have_one: Must contain at least 1 number and one uppercase
which_data_to_save_text: For example, your card number, the PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information that you need to have in a safe place.
